trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were 2 other sightings in San Diego on or around January 1st 2008
Summary: small dots orange four in a square
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a friends house on New Years Eve when i saw four orange-yellow dots in a perfect square flying uniformly from east to south west. We got another person out to see them with us. The dots continued west towards the horizon over the ocean they broke formation one at a time and disappeared a couple of second apart. I first noticed them when i was looking a the stars. I was amazed i though it was awesome. I was pretty curious about what i had seen.
